titleStmt.title: A handfull of holesome (though homelie) hearbs gathered out of the goodlie garden of Gods most holie word; for the common benefit and comfortable exercise of all such as are deuoutlie disposed. Collected and dedicated to all religious ladies, gentlewomen, and others; by Anne Wheathill, Gentlewoman.
titleStmt.author: Wheathill, Anne.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
